Column.Name: Approval Type
PDF View Name
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( AND( [PDF Feature Enabled] = TRUE, ISBLANK($thisValue) ), "PDF View Name is required for this feature to be enabled.", TRUE
)

Column.Name: Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [DisplayName] IS NOT NULL

Label.Text: This form is used to determine who will be required to approve a specific type of submission.
Enter rules to determine which approver types are required depending on the value of the submission.

Binding.Expression: IF( [DocuSign Integration] = TRUE, ARRAY("In System", "DocuSign"), ARRAY("In System") )

Label.Text: Who is required to approve depending on the value of the submission.

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Submission Type] = "Contract Initiation", "Contract", [Submission Type] = "Master List - Contract", "Contract", [Submission Type] = "Master List - Procurement", "Procurement", [Submission Type] = "Procurement Initiation", "Procurement",
[Submission Type] = "Evaluation - Final Decision", "Evaluation", [Submission Type] = "Evaluation - Shortlist", "Evaluation",
[Submission Type] = "Master List - Project", "Project",
[Submission Type] = "Extension", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Change of Details", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Variation", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Procurement Plan", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Purchase Order", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Variation", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Payment Certificate", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Exemption", [Submission Type], [Submission Type] = "Work Order", [Submission Type] )

Label.Text: Enter the following values to preview which approvals would be required for the scenario.
Run in context of an existing record (Optional)
Will allow rules like 'get contract manager from parent' to evaluate.
View of form to use for PDF
Attach PDF of the form being approved to the email notifications going out to approver(s).
If submission is cancelled, status of the parent record should change to:
What module is this approval in

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'System Builders' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system'
[Module] IS EMPTY OR [Module] = 'General'

STEP TO [Global Settings] ON ( ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Procurement Planning] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Procurement Planning') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Evaluations] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Evaluations') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Contracts] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Contracts') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Purchase Orders') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Information Requests] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Information Requests') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Meetings and Actions] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Meetings and Actions') ) GET COUNT(0) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'System Builders' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'system'
[Module] IS EMPTY OR [Module] = 'General'

STEP TO [Global Settings] ON ( ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Procurement Planning] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Procurement Planning') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Evaluations] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Evaluations') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Contracts] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Contracts') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Purchase Orders] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Purchase Orders') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Information Requests] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Information Requests') OR ([To].[Owns Integrated Module - Meetings and Actions] = TRUE AND [Module] = 'Meetings and Actions') ) GET COUNT(0) > 0
